titleStmt.title: A Full and true account of a bloody and dismal fight betwixt the English Protestants, and the French and Irish papists being an impartial relation, of a great victory obtained by Duke Scomberg's forces, over a party of King James's army in Ireland, since the joyful news of the Kings coming into this nation.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
